story_04_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
I can’t believe I lost to filth like you...
This...this is mortifying!
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0200_10:
All right, will you just calm down a second
and hear us out? Misty and I are actually
friends of Erika’s.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0300_10:
It’s true. We need to collect badges in order
to compete in the PML, and we heard that
we could get one from Erika.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Wait...you guys are friends of Lady Erika’s?
Oh no... Now I feel like a complete idiot.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0500_10:
Well, you didn’t really give us a chance to explain.
Anyway, as long as we’re all clear now...
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I’m still not happy I lost to you all...
but I suppose I owe you an apology.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0700_10:
It’s fine! Don’t worry about it.
It’s really no big deal.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Lady Erika really does have 
the loveliest friends... Thank you. 
Forgive my behavior a moment ago.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_0900_10:
If you’d like to speak with Lady Erika,
she’s just up ahead, a bit deeper into
the forest.
story_04_03000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Great! Thanks for the info!
Ready to go, everyone?
